page.title: 11HOLIDAYS IN MORETON
page.content: We visited one out of the 8 local people who have guests for{Bed and } {Breakfast.}Six people at one time can stay with her. The busiest time is from June until September. Most people who stay are on holiday and they come from all over the world as well as England. She said that some people from Germany come over to buy antiques. The{caravan site}holds 180 caravans (80 can plug into mains electricity). The site is open from March until September.People stay in caravans because of the cheapness and the freedom they have. The{restaurant} owner said he is busiest at the weekend and on{Tuesday (market day).} The people who eat at the restaurant are mainly tourists rather than local people. Both he and the Bed and Breakfast owner belong to the{English} {Tourist Board.}
